Body: I had installed xmod games apk. Then I had opened it. It showed me some 5 apps like advertisement. I had touched the app called "super flash light". After that, I am getting shortcuts in my home screen. I try to delete it but it is appearing one again. Shortcuts names: Lucky try, Recommended.
Title: "Lucky try" & "Recommended" shortcuts being created automatically on the homecreen
